summary: after killing hordes of bandits not only females in skyrim get sweaty bodies its natural for males in skyrim to have a sweaty body too :D
descriptionHtml:
[u][url=#45602407] Important[img]http://cdncache-a.akamaihd.net/items/it/img/arrow-10x10.png[/img][/url][/u]: pick only one main file the optionals are for the face pick one optional only as well , also keep in mind the enb i use in the screens has very high specularity that no existing enb has only my tweaked version looks so glossy so it kinda hides the drips a bit with other glossy effects but that will not happen with your enb

Version 1.1

*added less compressed files for those quality maniacs though they are not really that noticeable

*adds more sweat to legs,arms and chest

[img]http://i.imgur.com/9WwBg8Z.jpg[/img]


For a long time i waited for someone to create a sweaty body for males and no one did so I had to do it myself and im happy with the result thats why im sharing it with you guys, there is a supposedly sexy sweat for men here on the nexus but that guy just copied the female version textures on the male directory you could even see boobs on your male character in-game no kidding.
the sweaty body for girls im talking about and the one that inspired me to do this mod is [url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/28946/?]sporty sexy sweat
[/url]
READ THIS!!!!!!!!!!
This will not overwrite any of your main body textures so it doesnt mater if you use hairy or smooth skin the sweat fits both perfectly, it will not replace your face textures either, by the way the face file is uploaded separately since i dont know if people like to have sweaty faces, and the face texture is the only one that might do something to your face model since there are so many face textures i cant cover them all, like i said it will not change it but you might see a mole or something your character didnt have before just saying, thats why i uploaded separately.

Requirements:
Better males
or
Schlongs of skyrim

Compatibility:
I made two flavors to choose from one is for Better males and the other is for schlongs of skyrim (my personal favorite you wont find it on the nexus but you know where to look for it) tomorrow i might upload a version for SAM I just havent downloaded that one yet. though it should in theory work with any body including vanilla.

Installation:
just use NMM
manual installation just unpack the rar files and drop in skyrim installation folder
say yes to overwrite when prompted

Disclaimer:
1)The user experience may vary depending on the ENB he/she is using thats why I uploaded several screenshots with ENB on/off (check images section)

Credits:
I wanna give a shout at [url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/users/3329763]xs2reality[/url] for the inspiration
author: Tsukinomi
